thread.title: Valérie Nguyen VanTai
thread.title_full: eDreams evaluado por Valérie Nguyen VanTai

author: Valérie Nguyen VanTai
title: Valérie Nguyen VanTai
text:
Attention reservation Manager
Dear Madam / Sir,
I want you to know you have an exceptional employee,Sandhya, in your Reservation Department for the way she handled and send us our e-tickets round-trip from Cairo to Hurghada today. She is courteous and friendly.
Her knowledge of reservation system and her remarkable efficiency abilities are rare indeed nowadays.
I just thought you should know that Sandhya is a real asset to your business. Anyone who treats customers with so much kindness and respect is a rare jewel, and truly gives you an edge over your competition.
She is part of the reason we look forward to stay with you again in the future.
Regards,
Valérie
